# Separator

Separators create visual separation between sections of an interface.

## Props
optional = ?

| Name | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| width? | <code>"thin" &#124; "medium" &#124; "thick" &#124; "xthick"</code> |  |
| direction? | <code>"horizontal" &#124; "vertical"</code> |  |
